attributes.action: Introduce the Single Transferable Vote (STV) system before next General Election
attributes.additional_details: Electoral-reform.org have a comprehensive list of pros and cons of the STV system here - http://www.electoral-reform.org.uk/single-transferable-vote
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call upon HM Government to Introduce the Single Transferable Vote (STV) system across the whole of the U.K. before the next general election and for all general elections thereafter. Bring an end to safe seats, wasted votes and unaccountable MPs. Make every vote matter!
